Got it — you want this **exactly in MOSDAC order-entry format**, meaning:

For each required timestamp you want:

```
Start Date
End Date
Start GMT
End GMT
```

so you can directly enter it on the MOSDAC order page without thinking.

Below is the **correct format**.
Since most days have only one timestamp, Start GMT = End GMT.
Where two timestamps exist on same day, I give a **single safe window** so you order once.

---

# ✅ MOSDAC ORDER LIST (READY TO USE)

---

## ✅ JANUARY 2023

```
01-01-2023 | 01-01-2023 | 0345 | 0345
07-01-2023 | 07-01-2023 | 0315 | 0315
11-01-2023 | 11-01-2023 | 0530 | 0530
14-01-2023 | 14-01-2023 | 0530 | 0530
16-01-2023 | 16-01-2023 | 0345 | 0345
18-01-2023 | 18-01-2023 | 0515 | 0515
20-01-2023 | 20-01-2023 | 0600 | 0600
24-01-2023 | 24-01-2023 | 0400 | 0400
26-01-2023 | 26-01-2023 | 0530 | 0530
28-01-2023 | 28-01-2023 | 0515 | 0515
30-01-2023 | 30-01-2023 | 0600 | 0600
```

---

## ✅ FEBRUARY 2023

```
03-02-2023 | 03-02-2023 | 0400 | 0530
04-02-2023 | 04-02-2023 | 0600 | 0600
06-02-2023 | 06-02-2023 | 0545 | 0545
08-02-2023 | 08-02-2023 | 0400 | 0400
11-02-2023 | 11-02-2023 | 0500 | 0545
15-02-2023 | 15-02-2023 | 0530 | 0530
17-02-2023 | 17-02-2023 | 0515 | 0515
21-02-2023 | 21-02-2023 | 0545 | 0545
22-02-2023 | 22-02-2023 | 0330 | 0330
24-02-2023 | 24-02-2023 | 0500 | 0500
26-02-2023 | 26-02-2023 | 0500 | 0545
27-02-2023 | 27-02-2023 | 0515 | 0515
```

---

## ✅ MARCH 2023

```
01-03-2023 | 01-03-2023 | 0500 | 0500
02-03-2023 | 02-03-2023 | 0530 | 0530
06-03-2023 | 06-03-2023 | 0330 | 0500
07-03-2023 | 07-03-2023 | 0345 | 0345
08-03-2023 | 08-03-2023 | 0315 | 0545
10-03-2023 | 10-03-2023 | 0400 | 0400
14-03-2023 | 14-03-2023 | 0515 | 0515
```

---

```
13-04-2023 | 13-04-2023 | 0515 | 0515
19-04-2023 | 19-04-2023 | 0445 | 0445
```

---

## ✅ JUNE 2023

```
08-06-2023 | 08-06-2023 | 0300 | 0530
14-06-2023 | 14-06-2023 | 0330 | 0330
```

---

## ✅ JULY 2023

```
05-07-2023 | 05-07-2023 | 0245 | 0245
20-07-2023 | 20-07-2023 | 0300 | 0300
```

---

```
01-09-2023 | 01-09-2023 | 0315 | 0315
04-09-2023 | 04-09-2023 | 0545 | 0545
13-09-2023 | 13-09-2023 | 0300 | 0300
16-09-2023 | 16-09-2023 | 0300 | 0300
21-09-2023 | 21-09-2023 | 0300 | 0300
```

```

14-10-2023 | 14-10-2023 | 0315 | 0545
16-10-2023 | 16-10-2023 | 0300 | 0300
26-10-2023 | 26-10-2023 | 0300 | 0530
31-10-2023 | 31-10-2023 | 0300 | 0300
```

---

```
02-11-2023 | 02-11-2023 | 0245 | 0245
11-11-2023 | 11-11-2023 | 0600 | 0600
15-11-2023 | 15-11-2023 | 0530 | 0530
17-11-2023 | 17-11-2023 | 0530 | 0530
21-11-2023 | 21-11-2023 | 0330 | 0330
23-11-2023 | 23-11-2023 | 0315 | 0315
```

---

## ✅ DECEMBER 2023

```
03-12-2023 | 03-12-2023 | 0500 | 0500
14-12-2023 | 14-12-2023 | 0330 | 0330
16-12-2023 | 16-12-2023 | 0330 | 0330
21-12-2023 | 21-12-2023 | 0330 | 0330
25-12-2023 | 25-12-2023 | 0530 | 0530
26-12-2023 | 26-12-2023 | 0330 | 0330
27-12-2023 | 27-12-2023 | 0345 | 0530
28-12-2023 | 28-12-2023 | 0315 | 0315
29-12-2023 | 29-12-2023 | 0330 | 0330
```

---

✅ You can now literally copy each row into MOSDAC without calculating anything.

If you want next, I can show you a **10-minute ordering workflow** that prevents MOSDAC queue delays (this is something people learn only after ordering many datasets).
